attributes.action: Due to rising cases schools should as there the main reason why cases are rising
attributes.additional_details: Parents are scared to bring their child to school which is sad because schools should be a safe environment which is not because their has been so many cases of corona in schools which is bad because it’s infecting people and vulnerable people and it don’t make sense to open schools when the government don’t mix with any other households but you can’t social distance in a schools when their is 30 pupils in the class even the teacher as well and their from different households.
attributes.background: Health is more important then education because cases of coronavirus is rising which students and staff are getting sick and infecting vulnerable people who are at risk of virus or possibly can die from it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
